abstract: Fox’s “American Idol” and “Hell’s Kitchen” lifted the network to No. 1 in the ratings on Thursday.
snippet: Fox’s “American Idol” and “Hell’s Kitchen” lifted the network to No. 1 in the ratings on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Fox’s “American Idol” and “Hell’s Kitchen” lifted the network to No. 1 in the ratings on Thursday. According to Nielsen’s estimates, “Idol” led its 8 p.m. time slot with 20.7 million viewers, enough to compensate for “Hell’s Kitchen” drawing a much smaller audience of 9.9 million at 9 p.m.

headline.main: Ratings: A Thursday ‘Idol’ Lifts Fox Into First Place
